features: Suave Professionals Men Ocean Charge 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner has an advanced formula cleans and conditions all in one step
Formula enriched with moisturizers and panthenol, helps condition, leaving hair healthy-looking
Light-weight formula lathers and rinses clean without leaving build-up or weighing hair down
Refreshing shampoo made specifically for men's hair
body.description: Product Description Suave Men Ocean Charge 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner cleans and conditions hair all in one step. The formula is enriched with moisturizers and panthenol, and helps condition leaving hair looking healthy. The light-weight formula lathers and rinses clean without weighing hair down and making it feel oily. Suave Men Ocean Charge 2 in 1 shampoo and conditioner has been salon proven to clean and condition hair. Experience a salon-quality product in the comfort of your own home! Suave Men is range of products made specifically for men’s hair. For dandruff, try the Pure Power or Classic Clean Anti-Dandruff Shampoo and Conditioner options, or the styling gel or paste to keep your hair style in place. Experiment with all the hair products in the Suave range and find what works best for you. About Suave For over 75 years Suave has offered professional quality products for the entire family, which are proven to work as well as salon brands. The Suave mission is to make gold standard quality attainable to all, so everyone can look good, smell good, and feel good every day. From the Manufacturer Suave Professionals Men 2 in 1 Ocean Charge Shampoo/Conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This advanced shampoo and conditioner formula cleans and conditions in just one step. Enriched with moisturizers, Suave Men Ocean Charge 2-in-1 delivers healthy-looking hair and rinses away without build-up.

Works Hard. Smells Great. Suave Men Ocean Charge Collection refreshes and cleans hair without weighing it down, delivering a clean, masculine scent. Our Ingredients This formula is infused with moisturizers and panthenol to help condition and leave hair healthy-looking without oily residue. Salon-Quality Salon proven to clean hair as well as American Crew Moisturizing Shampoo. American Crew is a registered brand of Beautyge Brands USA, INC. Suave Men Promise For over 75 years Suave has helped men look and feel their best, with specially tailored ingredients to give modern gentlemen a well-groomed look.

Suave Men Thick & Full 2-in-1 Strengthening Shampoo + Conditioner, 28 oz Suave Men Citrus Rush 3in1 Daily Clean Shampoo + Conditioner + Body Wash, 28 oz Suave Men Citrus Rush 3in1 Daily Clean Shampoo + Conditioner + Body Wash, 28 oz Main Benefit Suave Men Thick & Full 2-in-1 Strengthening Shampoo Conditioner cleans and conditions hair in just one step. This triple-action formula is enriched with citrus extract, keratin amino acids and glycerin. This triple-action formula is enriched with citrus extract, keratin amino acids and glycerin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shampoo & body wash ever - Great value!!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Suave Men's Shampoo & Body Wash, and I have been pleasantly surprised by its performance and value. This product has quickly become a staple in my daily grooming routine, and here's why I have nothing but positive things to say about it:First and foremost, the convenience of an all-in-one product like Suave Men's Shampoo & Body Wash is a game-changer. It saves me time and space in the shower, making my morning routine more efficient. Plus, it's perfect for gym bags or travel, eliminating the need for multiple bottles.The scent of this product is fantastic. It's fresh and invigorating without being overpowering. I appreciate that it leaves me feeling clean and refreshed after each use, whether I'm using it as a shampoo or body wash.When it comes to performance, Suave Men's does not disappoint. It lathers up nicely, providing a thorough and satisfying clean for both hair and body. It rinses off easily, leaving no residue behind. My hair feels clean, and my skin feels refreshed, without any dryness or irritation.One of the standout features of this product is its affordability. It's incredibly budget-friendly without sacrificing quality. I feel like I'm getting a premium grooming experience at a fraction of the cost of some other brands.The packaging is also practical and user-friendly. The flip-top cap ensures easy dispensing, and the sleek design looks great in the shower or on my bathroom shelf.In summary, Suave Men's Shampoo & Body Wash is a reliable, affordable, and versatile grooming product that has exceeded my expectations. It simplifies my daily routine, leaves me feeling and smelling great, and offers excellent value for money. I highly recommend it to any guy looking for a straightforward and effective grooming solution. It's a top-notch product that gets the job done without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans without over conditioning. Many men's products want to thicken or over condition but this one just leaves the hair in a comfortable condition that is easy to comb. Good value too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You'll have clean hair!!!
reviews.reviewText: It's shampoo w/conditioner folks, it cleans hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and smelling great. In a pinch, you could use it as a body wash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't lather thick
reviews.reviewText: This is a low cost option. If you want a thicker lather use Dove. Had to use 2x as much shampoo to lather like the Dove options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best smelling shampoo in my opinion. Also rehydrates my hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the five pack deal
reviews.reviewText: I've always liked suave men's 2 in 1 shampoo and conditioner. Love to skip a step and I've gotten compliments on my hair after I use it. Smells good too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good price for 6 bottles of shampoo. Used to be able to buy for $2-$2.50 in stores. Arrived still sealed in original box with no spills.
